descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Kevin Durant blows by Jayson Tatum and knocks down the heavily-guarded shot to pass Allen Iverson for 25th on the all-time scoring list.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KD surpasses Iverson on the NBA's all-time scoring list) 2021/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: KD surpasses Iverson on the NBA's all-time scoring list

videos.description: Jayson Tatum skies to deny Cam Thomas' shot attempt.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tatum sends Cam Thomas' shot flying) 2021/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tatum sends Cam Thomas' shot flying

videos.description: James Harden pokes the ball out from Marcus Smart and Kevin Durant skies for the breakaway throwdown.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KD converts Harden's steal into a thunderous throwdown) 2021/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: KD converts Harden's steal into a thunderous throwdown

videos.description: LaMarcus Aldridge can't help but laugh at Marcus Smart for trying to deny him the basket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Aldridge laughs at Smart after backing him down for the bucket) 2021/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Aldridge laughs at Smart after backing him down for the bucket

videos.description: LaMarcus Aldridge takes his time and hits the smooth jumper on Jaylen Brown.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Aldridge drains tough turnaround jumper in Brown's face) 2021/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Aldridge drains tough turnaround jumper in Brown's face

videos.description: Kevin Durant and the Nets' bench get hyped after he gets the tough and-1 to fall.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KD gets fired up on acrobatic and-1) 2021/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: KD gets fired up on acrobatic and-1
